meanings.sent1: His hard work on the project warranted praise from his boss.
meanings.sent2: The evidence presented in court warranted further investigation.
meanings.sent3: The cat's antics in the kitchen warranted a chuckle from the family.
meanings.sent4: Her dedication to her studies warranted her the title of top student.
meanings.sent5: The storm's intensity warranted seeking shelter immediately.

meanings.sent1: The warranty on the product warrants its quality.
meanings.sent2: A good reputation can warrant trust from others.
meanings.sent3: The magician's confident smile warranted a successful trick.
meanings.sent4: The bright smile on her face warranted a positive response from the audience.
meanings.sent5: The clear instructions on the package warrant a successful assembly.

meanings.sent1: His dedication to the team warranted a promotion.
meanings.sent2: The exceptional performance of the actor warranted an award.
meanings.sent3: The delicious aroma of the bakery warranted a visit from passersby.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness and generosity warranted the admiration of her peers.
meanings.sent5: The breathtaking view from the mountaintop warranted the challenging hike.
